import React from 'react' import "./post.css" import MoreVertIcon from '@mui/icons-material/MoreVert'; import { Users } from "../../dummydata" function Post({post}) { const user= Users.filter() return (
R2D2 {post.date}
{post.desc}
{post.like} people like this
{post.comment} comments
) } export default Post
